name: A Shawn Story (itch)
description:
A Shawn Story follows a morning in the life of Shawn, a 20-something office worker who is late for work, AGAIN! Enter the narrator, a sarcastic British man who tries to dictate Shawn's life, although depending on your choices as Shawn, the narrator may help or hinder you in this side-splitting 2D choice making game!

"The hook for A Shawn Story - it's right there! 'You're late for work - AGAIN' - The Hard Croc (https://www.youtube.com/user/jtinker41)

"The true strength of the game is in its narration.  The sarcastic British narrator, for the trailer, tells the story in very few words, throwing a few jokes in at the same time" - The W2 Report (http://thew2report.blogspot.co.uk/)

 "A well-created, hilarious game with pleasing pixel art graphics" - SirGoose http://steamcommunity.com/id/sirgoosie/

"A short game with loads of jokes and multiple endings" - Divetic

"10/10. THE NARRATOR SOUNDS SMART AND HANDSOME!" - The Narrator,  A Shawn Story.

So what are YOU waiting for? Play today!

If you spend 4 British Pounds (via the perks section) that The Narrator loves so much and get YOUR name in the credits of all our future games....

You'll get a shoutout in the description on our profile and games, you'll get all the games we've ever made (even ones that aren't published!) and a personal email.

Or don't ... I don't give a fuuuuuuu

I actually give many f's. Please, for The Narrator? SHAAAWWWN!
